home.bio: A software engineer with over 7 years of experience in web application development

about.title: About
about.bio:
A software engineer with over 7 years of experience in web application development, with a strong background in problem-solving, adaptability, and driving solutions from start to finish.

Led and contributed to the development of applications for public and private companies across diverse sectors, using languages and tools such as TypeScript, Vue.js, Nuxt, PHP, Laravel, and Node.js. Takes ownership of solutions while collaborating effectively with teams, quickly adapting to new technologies and challenges.

Holds a BS in Computer Science and is pursuing a specialization certificate in Technical Leadership.

seniorAtlas.title: Senior Front-end Engineer
seniorAtlas.description:
• Work on performance and developer experience (DX) improvements as part of the platform team
  • Upgrade projects to Vue 3 and Nuxt 3
  • Migrate pages to a Nuxt 3 project
  • Achieve a 74% increase in the performance of a key page

consultantAtlas.title: Front-end Engineering Consultant
consultantAtlas.description:
• Mentored and provided technical guidance to front-end engineers
  • Analyzed and developed project improvements
  • Contributed to the development of a component library using Lerna, TypeScript, and Vue.js
  • Contributed to the migration of key pages to a Nuxt project

frontAtlas.title: Front-end Engineer
frontAtlas.description:
• Contributed to the development of a security feature for a platform with over 20 million monthly visits
  • Deployed and monitored front-end tasks in production
  • Contributed with code reviews across multiple teams
  • Tracked and organized tasks in Jira using Scrum

ceoNuxstep.title: CEO & Co-Founder
ceoNuxstep.description:
• Planned, developed, and deployed web and mobile applications
  • Contributed to the execution of IT infrastructure projects
  • Developed a plugin that integrates Spotify's SDK into NativeScript using TypeScript

internGmaes.title: Software Development Intern
internGmaes.description:
• Developed an inventory system for the City Hall of Francisco Beltr√£o using Vue.js and Laravel
  • Planned and developed the new website for the Federal Council of Engineering and Agronomy (CONFEA) using Drupal
  • Developed an integration between the Nuvemshop e-commerce platform and the SkyHub marketplace integrator using Nuxt and Node.js
  • Deployed and managed applications on Linux and Windows servers
